participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, Jessica enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing knowledge with others. She's friendly and approachable, often using humor to connect.
participant_1.background: I've started my own finance blog, and it's been a lot of fun! My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time. I own a black suburban. My favorite coffee is french vanilla. My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and somewhat introverted, Ethan has a passion for music and enjoys deep conversations. He values close relationships and has a playful side when it comes to his interests.
participant_2.background: I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother. I'm a bad boyfriend, but I love my cats. I am a violinist. I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university. I enjoy being active, and my family is always up for an adventure.

content.text: I've started my own finance blog, and it's been a lot of fun!
My sister is a finance major! How did you get into it?
I was always really interested in it, and I studied it in college.
I'm not sure what I want to major in yet.
I like music, but I'm not sure if I want to make a career out of it.
Well, there are a lot of different jobs you can get with a music degree.
I know, but I'm not sure what I want to do.
You could always be a music teacher, or you could work in the music industry.
I like those ideas! I'll have to think about it.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I mostly listen to rock and alternative.
Me too! I love rock and alternative music.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of bands, but my favorites are probably The Killers, The Strokes, and Arctic Monkeys.
I love The Killers! I haven't listened to The Strokes or Arctic Monkeys in a while, but I used to love them.
